Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Mondi Štětí a.s.
Nejlepší zaměstnavatel v České republice? Mondi Štětí!
Jsme největší výrobce papírových obalů a buničiny na českém trhu.
V letošním ročníku Sodexo Zaměstnavatel roku jsme opět získali první místo v soutěži Nejlepší zaměstnavatel regionu, a navíc jsme se stali i Nejlepším zaměstnavatelem v České republice v kategorii firem do 5000 zaměstnanců!

Description:
Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Description:
Relocation Assistance Offered Within Region
# 152230 - Hustopece, Jihomoravský kraj, Czech Republic
Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Job_title: IT Trainee Program - Junior Cloud Engineer
Description:
Position characteristics:
We are looking for recent graduates in our IT Trainee Program who will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Technology teams.
Over the course of the two-year program you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have open positions for several roles and your landing role should be Junior Cloud Engineer. However, if you decide to change specialization during the two-year program, the landing role may end up in another team with a different focus.

Job_title: Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
Description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
The Mastercard Launch program is aimed at early career talent, to help you develop skills and gain cross-functional work experience. Over a period of 18 months, Launch participants will be assigned to a business unit, learn and develop skills, and gain valuable on the job experience.

Be part of the Data & Services Technology Team at Mastercard, Data and Services

Data Engineers are fundamental to the success of our client engagements by acting as the bridge between raw client data and Mastercard's software. Data Engineers work closely with both Consultants while working on consulting engagements and Software Development Engineers while working to develop internal capabilities. Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Description:
LOCATION: Liberec / Czech Republic | BRAND: KNORR-BREMSE | REQUISITION ID: 2645

We see it as our daily mission to make a significant contribution to greater safety and efficiency on roads and railways. That goes for passenger and goods transport - all over the world.

Making mobility safe on roads and railways - that is the mission driving us each and every day at Knorr-Bremse. It has been that way for over 110 years. Today the Knorr-Bremse Group, based in Munich, is the world's leading manufacturer of braking systems and a leading supplier of safety-critical sub-systems for rail and commercial vehicles. As an innovator in our fields, we advance developments in mobility and transport technologies.

JOB DESCRIPTION:



WHAT WE OFFER

Through a blend of engineering excellence, sustainable development and social responsibility, our employees help to drive progress at more than 100 sites in 30 countries. We offer you an exciting role with plenty of variety in an international environment, as part of an attractive package that extends from flexible working hour models, via professional and personal development opportunities, all the way to sports and healthcare programs.

ARE YOU INTERESTED?

Then join us! We look forward to receiving your online application!

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer Junior would be to help the team with covering service tickets and incidents. This will give you a good understanding of the typical issues and how our applications work. Later on you will be participating on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support.

Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Be curious
Willingness to learn new things
Basic knowledge of Big Data technologies (Cloudera, Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
Basic knowledge of any JVM programming language (Java, Scala)
Nice to have

Experience with Hadoop (Cloudera distribution) and Kafka
Knowledge of RDBMS
Experience with SQL
Knowledge of GitLab and CI/CD pipelines
Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding

Join our EmbedIT family and enjoy

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with!

Our BI team has responsibilities for the operation of big data platforms and other supportive platforms used in BI domain. For example, we install Hadoop clusters, extend HW, implement new supportive BI tools and subsequently our team maintain, support, update, patch, security, and monitor these platform and tools.

We work with various tools and technologies. Our administrators make their life easier with Ansible. We support physical and virtual servers usually running on OS Linux.

Our business partners are from the headquarters of Home Credit International placed in Prague and Home Credits in countries (India, Indonesia, Philippines, and Vietnam). The team is distributed between two locations - Prague and Brno.

Your future role

Your primary responsibility as a Big Data DevOps Engineer will be to provide BigData platform maintenance, automation, development, operations, monitoring and product support from an infrastructure and operational perspective. Prioritizes working with code and using it as a tool during product development, instead of performing tasks manually.

Not a stranger to continuous integration, pipelines, virtualization technologies, containers etc.

Has a passion for product built. Participate in design and automation improvements to continuously improve production and non-production environment. Opportunities participate on projects.

Your experience and skills
Good knowledge of Linux
Basic knowledge of Python & Bash scripting
Knowledge of working with versioning tool (Github)
Basic knowledge of SQL & Databases
Problem-solving attitude
Collaborative team spirit
Willingness to learn new things
Nice to have

Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding.
Knowledge of configuration management tools (Ansible, …)
Understanding of CI/CD tools and processes (Gitlab pipelines)
Experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role

Join our EmbedIT family and enjoy

Description:
Internship/SW Developer - part time-230000XP

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Internship - Software Engineer - Platform

Part time paid job for students with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Mastercard Summer Internship Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
Apply for an internship and spend your summer enhancing your skills, sharing your ideas and making a difference in the real world. The Mastercard Internship Program gives penultimate students a 10-12 week journey where they will challenge the status quo, engage in meaningful and practical sessions, drive Decency and Belonging, our mission to be a Force for Good and be the ultimate catalyst for personal and professional growth. Belvac is the world leader in the design and production of continuous motion rotary machinery. We provide beverage canmakers with high-speed trimming, necking, base reprofiling and reforming, shaping, bottom rim coating, flanging and inspection technology. Over the years, we have been responsible for numerous advances in canmaking technology. This technology has enabled our customers to steadily increase line speeds and improve quality and productivity, while significantly reducing materials costs. Belvac was founded in 1962 in Lynchburg Virginia. Philosophies of quality, pride, craftsmanship, and work ethic set extremely high standards and quickly drove Belvac to become the world leader in its industry revolutionizing many manufacturing processes. For over forty years Belvac has turned innovative ideas into world class machinery. Serving both the Can Making and Plastics industry.sts.

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.
Specific Role Responsibilities
Working with Internal and Client SME resource to provide complex data mapping solutions in line with Client requirements, FNZ Solution and FNZ Migration SDLC
Producing technical migration outputs, such as data models, data mapping definitions and data validation rules in line with the target FNZ Product and Client Migration requirements

Description:
Základní kvalifikace:
Být absolventem/absolventkou střední nebo vyšší odborné školy s IT specializací nebo specializací v příbuzném oboru nebo odborné pracovní zkušenosti v oboru.
Znalost počítačů (hardwaru i softwaru) a ochota učit se novým technologiím a dovednostem.
Prokázaná předchozí zkušenost se zlepšováním stávajících procesů a postupů při poskytování prvotřídních služeb.
Předchozí zkušenost se spoluprací s různorodými týmy.
Zákaznicky orientovaný přístup s prokazatelnou historií.
Znalost českého jazyka.
Popis práce
V Amazonu aspirujeme být společností nejvíce zaměřenou na zákazníky na světě, kde zákazníci mohou najít, objevit a nakoupit on-line vše, co chtějí. Najímáme ty nejchytřejší a nabízíme jim prostředí, ve kterém mohou neúnavně zlepšovat možnosti pro naše zákazníky a tím jejich zkušenosti s našimi službami.
Inovace a kreativita jsou jádrem společnosti a jsou podporovány na všech úrovních našich zaměstnanců. Každý den řešíme složité technické a obchodní problémy pomocí vynalézavosti a zjednodušování. Vytváříme historii a dobrou zprávou je, že jsme teprve na začátku.
Jako IT Technik / IT Engineer budete reportovat IT Manažerovi ve vašem domovském distribučním centru a budete zodpovědní za přímou podporu lidí pracujících v provozním týmu. Takto budete bezprostředně podporovat ty, kteří přímo umožňují doručení zakoupených položek zákazníkům. Budete spolupracovat s různými odděleními, kterým vy a vaši kolegové poskytnete prvotřídní IT podporu. Budete klíčovou součástí různorodého týmu, ve kterém budete přinášet vysoce kvalitní výsledky a vždy hledat zlepšení.
Nejedná se o tradiční kancelářskou roli, budete sídlit v srdci našeho distribučního centra a pracovat na směny, a to buď 8 hodin v pěti dnech v týdnu nebo 10 hodin ve čtyřech dnech v týdnu.
Chcete-li se dozvědět více o provozu Amazonu a vidět, jak fungují naše distribuční centra, podívejte se na krátké video nebo se zúčastněte živé virtuální prohlídky. Video s titulky: https://www.amazon.com/videotour
Co dělá tento tým skvělým místem pro práci?
Benefity
Key job responsibilities


Budete poskytovat podporu 1. a 2. úrovně (přes tiketový systém), která zajišťuje, že veškeré IT vybavení a infrastruktura běží na optimální výkon a že jsou plněny všechny klíčové ukazatele (KPI) a úroveň služeb (SLA) ve vašem distribučním centru a také v jakémkoliv vzdáleném centru, které Vy a Váš tým podporujete.



Preferovaná kvalifikace
Vezměte prosím na vědomí, že nemusíte splňovat všechny výše uvedené požadavky; jakákoli kombinace je vítána!

Amazon se zavazuje k zajištění rovných pracovních příležitostí pro všechny uchazeče. Pevně věříme, že nábor zaměstnanců s různými dovednostmi je základem našeho úspěchu. Při náboru se rozhodujeme na základě vašich zkušeností a dovedností. Ceníme si vaší vášně objevovat, vymýšlet, zjednodušovat a budovat.
Ochrana vašeho soukromí a bezpečnost vašich dat je pro Amazon dlouhodobě nejvyšší prioritou. Přečtěte si prosím naše Oznámení o ochraně osobních údajů, kde se dozvíte více o tom, jak shromažďujeme, používáme a přenášíme osobní údaje našich kandidátů.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Description:

Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Description:
We help the world run better
Our company culture is focused on helping our employees enable innovation by building breakthroughs together. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from. Apply now!

About SAP Signavio

SAP Signavio helps our customers understand, improve, and transform all their business processes – fast and in scale. SAP Signavio was created through the merger of Signavio, the leading cloud provider for process management, with SAP’s own process analytics product teams. Today, SAP Signavio is one of the fastest growing cloud units within SAP and represents SAP’s spearhead for all things process.

Job_title: Global Data Engineer, Data Mgmt & Governance x2
Description:
2023 will see Sandoz become a standalone organization! As a global market leader in Generics and Biosimilar medicine, Sandoz is stepping forward from a position of strength! Those joining Sandoz in the coming months will help shape the future of the company, it’s growth, innovation, culture and how Sandoz impacts the lives of millions. These will be careers with genuine impact! This is one such role!

Job Purpose

As a Global Senior Data Engineer, you will be responsible for building and maintaining Sandoz’s solutions and infrastructure, enabling the enterprise's cutting-edge data products and services.

Major Accountabilities


Key Performance Indicators

Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Data Engineer II
Mastercard Overview

Mastercard is the global technology company behind the world’s fastest payments processing network. We are a vehicle for commerce, a connection to financial systems for the previously excluded, a technology innovation lab, and the home of Priceless®. We ensure every employee can be a part of something bigger and change lives. We believe as our company grows, so should you. We believe in connecting everyone to endless, priceless possibilities.

Join a fast-growing team

As a Data Engineer, you will develop data & analytics solutions that sit atop vast datasets gathered by retail stores, restaurants, banks, and other consumer-focused companies. The challenge will be to create high-performance algorithms, cutting-edge analytical techniques including machine learning and artificial intelligence, and intuitive workflows that allow our users to derive insights from big data that in turn drive their businesses. You will have the opportunity to create high-performance analytic solutions based on data sets measured in the billions of transactions and front-end visualizations to unleash the value of big data.
You will have the opportunity to develop data-driven innovative analytical solutions and identify opportunities to support business and client needs in a quantitative manner and facilitate informed recommendations/decisions through activities like building ML models, automated data pipelines, designing data architecture/schema, performing jobs in big data cluster by using different execution engines and program languages such as Hive/Impala, Python, Spark, R, etc.
Your Role

Ideal Candidate Qualifications:

The following skills will be considered as a plus

Description:
Application Engineer - suitable for graduates
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a new addition to our Robotics Division to expand our existing team as an Application Engineer. Your task will be to implement robotic workplace projects in various industries. Our customers are in all sectors but predominantly Automotive Tier 1. Our projects are from installation to handover and are mainly abroad, in countries like Spain, France, Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Russia or Israel and occasionally the Czech Republic. You can spend up to 6 months a year on these projects in total, so it's more for someone who enjoys travelling and wants to see the world. This position is suitable for experienced PLC programmers or application engineers, as well as electrical graduates who are interested in robotics and like to travel. Once you start, you don't work on projects alone, but always with more experienced colleagues to get a good grounding. For more information about our robotics division in the country, click on the link below: https://new.abb.com/products/robotics/cs Will you join us?

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
Junior Software Developer - fresh graduate-230000XO

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Junior Software Engineer - Platform
Full time job for fresh graduate student finishing this year or being MAX 12months after UNI graduation with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

Description:
Brno, Prague
Hello, we are Meiro
In Meiro, through our product – a Customer Data Platform (CDP) – and thanks to years of our know-how, we solve the fragmentation of customer data for companies all over the world. CDP gives access to organized, clean, and stitched customer data from multiple data sources. The strength of CDP is its ability to integrate any data source in and out of CDP. The data are collected, consolidated, cleaned and ready to be used in other systems and tools.
Our headquarters is in Singapore with part of our team. The rest of us are based between Brno and Prague. You could find our clients in Australia, Southeast Asia, Central Europe, or Scandinavia.

‍

Emplifi is a leading unified customer engagement platform that empowers businesses to reach and grow communities through digital- and social-first strategies. More than 20,000 brands like McDonald's, Ford Motor Company, and Delta Air Lines rely on Emplifi to enable connected, empathetic experiences for the modern consumer across marketing, commerce, and care. Headquartered in New York, Emplifi is a partner to the major social media networks and digital platforms, including Google, Meta, LinkedIn, TikTok, and Snapchat.
Our senior data engineer is able to suggest innovative solutions and solve the most complex technical problems the team faces, but also participate heavily on development and implementation; be a role model for the less experienced members of the team, with delivering exceptional code and willingness to help. Besides technical skills, great communication and ability to sell technical concepts and ideas is a must.

Description:
Company Description

WE are EW - founded just over 27 years ago Eurowag is one of the fastest growing, integrated mobility and payment solution companies in Europe. We focus on finding solutions that simplify the lives of commercial mobility companies.
Our vision is to democratize the on-road mobility industry by creating sustainable financial & technological solutions for the benefit of our industry, society and the environment.

Job Description



The Mission of Data Engineering is to define, develop and maintain overall data architecture covering all data domains within Eurowag.

Základní kvalifikace:
Být absolventem/absolventkou střední nebo vyšší odborné školy s IT specializací nebo specializací v příbuzném oboru nebo odborné pracovní zkušenosti v oboru.
Znalost počítačů (hardwaru i softwaru) a ochota učit se novým technologiím a dovednostem.
Prokázaná předchozí zkušenost se zlepšováním stávajících procesů a postupů při poskytování prvotřídních služeb.
Předchozí zkušenost se spoluprací s různorodými týmy.
Zákaznicky orientovaný přístup s prokazatelnou historií.
Znalost českého jazyka.
Popis práce
V Amazonu aspirujeme být společností nejvíce zaměřenou na zákazníky na světě, kde zákazníci mohou najít, objevit a nakoupit on-line vše, co chtějí. Najímáme ty nejchytřejší a nabízíme jim prostředí, ve kterém mohou neúnavně zlepšovat možnosti pro naše zákazníky a tím jejich zkušenosti s našimi službami.
Inovace a kreativita jsou jádrem společnosti a jsou podporovány na všech úrovních našich zaměstnanců. Každý den řešíme složité technické a obchodní problémy pomocí vynalézavosti a zjednodušování. Vytváříme historii a dobrou zprávou je, že jsme teprve na začátku.
Jako IT Technik / IT Engineer budete reportovat IT Manažerovi ve vašem domovském distribučním centru a budete zodpovědní za přímou podporu lidí pracujících v provozním týmu. Takto budete bezprostředně podporovat ty, kteří přímo umožňují doručení zakoupených položek zákazníkům. Budete spolupracovat s různými odděleními, kterým vy a vaši kolegové poskytnete prvotřídní IT podporu. Budete klíčovou součástí různorodého týmu, ve kterém budete přinášet vysoce kvalitní výsledky a vždy hledat zlepšení.
Nejedná se o tradiční kancelářskou roli, budete sídlit v srdci našeho distribučního centra a pracovat na směny, a to buď 8 hodin v pěti dnech v týdnu nebo 10 hodin ve čtyřech dnech v týdnu.
Chcete-li se dozvědět více o provozu Amazonu a vidět, jak fungují naše distribuční centra, podívejte se na krátké video nebo se zúčastněte živé virtuální prohlídky. Video s titulky: https://www.amazon.com/videotour
Co dělá tento tým skvělým místem pro práci?
Benefity
Key job responsibilities


Budete poskytovat podporu 1. a 2. úrovně (přes tiketový systém), která zajišťuje, že veškeré IT vybavení a infrastruktura běží na optimální výkon a že jsou plněny všechny klíčové ukazatele (KPI) a úroveň služeb (SLA) ve vašem distribučním centru a také v jakémkoliv vzdáleném centru, které Vy a Váš tým podporujete.



Preferovaná kvalifikace
Vezměte prosím na vědomí, že nemusíte splňovat všechny výše uvedené požadavky; jakákoli kombinace je vítána!

Amazon se zavazuje k zajištění rovných pracovních příležitostí pro všechny uchazeče. Pevně věříme, že nábor zaměstnanců s různými dovednostmi je základem našeho úspěchu. Při náboru se rozhodujeme na základě vašich zkušeností a dovedností. Ceníme si vaší vášně objevovat, vymýšlet, zjednodušovat a budovat.
Ochrana vašeho soukromí a bezpečnost vašich dat je pro Amazon dlouhodobě nejvyšší prioritou. Přečtěte si prosím naše Oznámení o ochraně osobních údajů, kde se dozvíte více o tom, jak shromažďujeme, používáme a přenášíme osobní údaje našich kandidátů.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Description:
Programujete v ReactJS? Zajímáte se o letectví? Ozvěte se! Jsme start-up, který vytváří unikátní IT řešení pro sběr a vyhodnocování dat o bezpečnosti v letecké dopravě. Jsme mladý tým IT expertů a expertů na provozní bezpečnost v letectví. Spolupracujeme s klíčovými organizacemi českého letectví i s akademickou sférou. S naším řešením míříme na světový trh.
Co očekáváme my od Vás:
týmového ducha (ideálně se zkušeností práce v agilním týmu) a chuť do práce,
smysl pro návrh uživatelského rozhraní,
znalost principů softwarového inženýrství - návrh webových aplikací, REST, tvorba automatických testů,
zkušenost s programováním front-end aplikací v ReactJS, TypeScript, CSS, HTML,

Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Description:
Role : Data Engineer

Job Location : Prague – Hybrid

Teradata helps businesses unlock value by turning data into their greatest asset. We’re the cloud data analytics platform company, built for a hybrid multi-cloud reality, solving the world's most complex data challenges at scale. Collectively, we endeavour to serve equal parts innovator and contributor. Because our mission isn’t just about the collection of data – it’s about revolutionizing the future of transportation to save lives, optimizing energy costs to make the planet a cleaner place, and using data to predict and identify cancer risks.

Teradata’s Global Delivery Center (GDC) brings together data enthusiasts from all corners of the world to support our customers within the EMEA region. We analyze their business needs and address them with the most sophisticated data solutions including Data Warehouses, Data Lakes, Operational Data Stores and much more.

Role Description

We are looking for a Data Engineer to perform various tasks during the Data Warehouse implementation like analyses, database and architecture design, gathering business requirements, creating testing and implementation scenarios, developing and implementing planned solutions etc.


Performing data warehouse tasks for large projects (database design, business analyses, collecting business requirements and translating into technical solution, ETL development)

Deliver business and application specific consulting services included in the integrated Teradata solutions

Support the pre-sale process as well as client communication

Participating in a mapping and design of customer’s business needs to the Teradata database and BI components

Understand Business Data Model and logical mappings (source mappings, LDM mappings)

Understand detailed, technical Source Target mappings

Develop and implement ETL and BI solutions

Perform unit testing and package jobs to be prepared for deployment

Present and explain the implanted solution to the customer


Any experience working on DWH projects

Familiar with collecting business requirements and transforming them to the technical solution

Familiar with the creation/modification of a Data Model and Mappings or Technical ETL specifications (Source to Target Mapping)

Excellent SQL knowhow

ETL development, implementation, documentation and testing experience

Experience with programming languages (e.g., Python, Groovy, Java, Perl, …)

Flexibility in working from Prague (Czech Republic) with business trips abroad if required by the customer

Advanced English

EU passport or work permit for Czech Republic is required


Knowledge of scripting and programming

Familiar with CASE modeling

Experience with ETL tools and best practices

Knowledge of Teradata products and tools and utilities

Experience with End to End solution development

Any other European language


World-class technical training within Teradata University

Every new hire gets a detailed training plan containing on-site training about Teradata Vantage architecture

25 days of holiday a year, 3 sick days and various other time off to enjoy special occasions

Flexibility of working from home and from our fully equipped office in the 24 th floor of the second tallest building in Prague

Private medical care

Meal vouchers

Company’s contribution for the Pension fund

Life insurance

Company’s assistance in case of sickness (25% of your gross base salary) in addition to local regulations

Employee referral program (4,000$ USD)

Relocation bonus (if coming to Prague from abroad)

Sports and activities membership program

Language courses for employees

Employee stock purchase program

Contribution of 300$ USD for a mobile phone of your choice (every 2 years)

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. Mostly thanks to Kafka we are able to consume data much faster. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer is to work on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support. Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Knowledge of Scala and Spark
Experience with Hadoop (Cloudera distribution), Hive and Kafka
Experience with SQL
Knowledge of working with GitLab
Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding
Join our EmbedIT family and enjoy

Easily negotiable flexi office
Motivating yearly bonuses
5 weeks of paid vacation
5 days Personal time off
Meal allowances
Contribution to pension scheme
Possible foreign business trips
Complimentary tea, subsidised coffee, free fruit on Mondays and Wednesdays
Relax room & games room
Technical trainings and certificates of your choice
Attendance at local & foreign conferences
Soft-skills and managerial trainings
Possible internal growth

General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! V dnesni dobe muzeme nabidnou i urcitou jistotu zamestnani - objednavky mame na vice nez 3 roky dopredu.
Responsibilities: CO VAS V TETO ROLI CEKA? Navrh technickeho reseni na zaklade pozadavku zakaznika Priprava vykresove dokumentace pro nabidky a vyberova rizeni Projektovani ve 2D i 3D Zpracovani nakladovych kalkulaci k nabizenym projektum Kazdodenni uzka spoluprace se Svycarskym obchodnim oddelenim v anglickem jazyce Navhry zlepsovani procesu v ramci oddeleni.
Your background: PREDPOKLADY PRO VYKON TETO PRACE: VS elektrotechnickeho nebo strojniho zamereni Lepsi uzivatelska znalost prace na PC: MS Office, AutoCAD (Creo vyhodou) Znalost anglickeho jazyka na B2 prevazne pro pisemnou i ustni komunikaci se Svycarskem Selsky rozum a schopnost videt jednotlive ukoly i v sirsim kontextu Snaha ziskavat relevantni informace, spolupracovat s kolegy a dotahovat svoje ukoly do uspesneho konce a vcas. Vyhodou znalost programovani CO VAM NABIZIME: Praci na zajimavych a jedinecnych projektech do celeho sveta. Firemni kulturu postavenou na lidskych hodno-tach, vzajemnem respektu, poctivosti, kooperaci a hledani smysluplnych a efektivnich reseni. Jistotu uspesne globalni firmy v oblasti energie, ktera ma budoucnost (na dalsi 3 roky mame zajistene zakazky) Dobrou dopravni dostupnost, parkovani zdarma. Pracovi smlouvu na dobu 1 roku (v pripade spokojenosti obou stran je zvykem smlouvu prodlouzit na dobu neurcitou) 5 tydnu dovolene 7,5 hodin pruzne pracovni doby Dotovane stravovani v zavodni jidelne/stravenky Cafeteria system (moznost vyuzit nasbirane body v oblasti vzdelani, sportu nebo jinych volnocasovych aktivit) ve vysi 6 000 Kc rocne. Prispevek na penzijni pripojisteni 2-3 % ze mzdy. Mobilni SIM karty se zvyhodnenym pausalem. Odmeny za odpracovane roky a take pri odchodu do duchodu a dalsi benefity. Tesim se na Vase zivotopisy

#LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
Základní kvalifikace:
Být absolventem/absolventkou střední nebo vyšší odborné školy s IT specializací nebo specializací v příbuzném oboru nebo odborné pracovní zkušenosti v oboru.
Znalost počítačů (hardwaru i softwaru) a ochota učit se novým technologiím a dovednostem.
Prokázaná předchozí zkušenost se zlepšováním stávajících procesů a postupů při poskytování prvotřídních služeb.
Předchozí zkušenost se spoluprací s různorodými týmy.
Zákaznicky orientovaný přístup s prokazatelnou historií.
Znalost českého jazyka.
Popis práce
V Amazonu aspirujeme být společností nejvíce zaměřenou na zákazníky na světě, kde zákazníci mohou najít, objevit a nakoupit on-line vše, co chtějí. Najímáme ty nejchytřejší a nabízíme jim prostředí, ve kterém mohou neúnavně zlepšovat možnosti pro naše zákazníky a tím jejich zkušenosti s našimi službami.
Inovace a kreativita jsou jádrem společnosti a jsou podporovány na všech úrovních našich zaměstnanců. Každý den řešíme složité technické a obchodní problémy pomocí vynalézavosti a zjednodušování. Vytváříme historii a dobrou zprávou je, že jsme teprve na začátku.
Jako IT Technik / IT Engineer budete reportovat IT Manažerovi ve vašem domovském distribučním centru a budete zodpovědní za přímou podporu lidí pracujících v provozním týmu. Takto budete bezprostředně podporovat ty, kteří přímo umožňují doručení zakoupených položek zákazníkům. Budete spolupracovat s různými odděleními, kterým vy a vaši kolegové poskytnete prvotřídní IT podporu. Budete klíčovou součástí různorodého týmu, ve kterém budete přinášet vysoce kvalitní výsledky a vždy hledat zlepšení.
Nejedná se o tradiční kancelářskou roli, budete sídlit v srdci našeho distribučního centra a pracovat na směny, a to buď 8 hodin v pěti dnech v týdnu nebo 10 hodin ve čtyřech dnech v týdnu.
Chcete-li se dozvědět více o provozu Amazonu a vidět, jak fungují naše distribuční centra, podívejte se na krátké video nebo se zúčastněte živé virtuální prohlídky. Video s titulky: https://www.amazon.com/videotour
Co dělá tento tým skvělým místem pro práci?
Benefity
Key job responsibilities


Budete poskytovat podporu 1. a 2. úrovně (přes tiketový systém), která zajišťuje, že veškeré IT vybavení a infrastruktura běží na optimální výkon a že jsou plněny všechny klíčové ukazatele (KPI) a úroveň služeb (SLA) ve vašem distribučním centru a také v jakémkoliv vzdáleném centru, které Vy a Váš tým podporujete.



Preferovaná kvalifikace
Vezměte prosím na vědomí, že nemusíte splňovat všechny výše uvedené požadavky; jakákoli kombinace je vítána!

Amazon se zavazuje k zajištění rovných pracovních příležitostí pro všechny uchazeče. Pevně věříme, že nábor zaměstnanců s různými dovednostmi je základem našeho úspěchu. Při náboru se rozhodujeme na základě vašich zkušeností a dovedností. Ceníme si vaší vášně objevovat, vymýšlet, zjednodušovat a budovat.
Ochrana vašeho soukromí a bezpečnost vašich dat je pro Amazon dlouhodobě nejvyšší prioritou. Přečtěte si prosím naše Oznámení o ochraně osobních údajů, kde se dozvíte více o tom, jak shromažďujeme, používáme a přenášíme osobní údaje našich kandidátů.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Description:
Junior Software Developer - fresh graduate-230000XO

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Junior Software Engineer - Platform
Full time job for fresh graduate student finishing this year or being MAX 12months after UNI graduation with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

Description:
Role : Data Engineer

Job Location : Prague – Hybrid

Teradata helps businesses unlock value by turning data into their greatest asset. We’re the cloud data analytics platform company, built for a hybrid multi-cloud reality, solving the world's most complex data challenges at scale. Collectively, we endeavour to serve equal parts innovator and contributor. Because our mission isn’t just about the collection of data – it’s about revolutionizing the future of transportation to save lives, optimizing energy costs to make the planet a cleaner place, and using data to predict and identify cancer risks.

Teradata’s Global Delivery Center (GDC) brings together data enthusiasts from all corners of the world to support our customers within the EMEA region. We analyze their business needs and address them with the most sophisticated data solutions including Data Warehouses, Data Lakes, Operational Data Stores and much more.

Role Description

We are looking for a Data Engineer to perform various tasks during the Data Warehouse implementation like analyses, database and architecture design, gathering business requirements, creating testing and implementation scenarios, developing and implementing planned solutions etc.


Performing data warehouse tasks for large projects (database design, business analyses, collecting business requirements and translating into technical solution, ETL development)

Deliver business and application specific consulting services included in the integrated Teradata solutions

Support the pre-sale process as well as client communication

Participating in a mapping and design of customer’s business needs to the Teradata database and BI components

Understand Business Data Model and logical mappings (source mappings, LDM mappings)

Understand detailed, technical Source Target mappings

Develop and implement ETL and BI solutions

Perform unit testing and package jobs to be prepared for deployment

Present and explain the implanted solution to the customer


Any experience working on DWH projects

Familiar with collecting business requirements and transforming them to the technical solution

Familiar with the creation/modification of a Data Model and Mappings or Technical ETL specifications (Source to Target Mapping)

Excellent SQL knowhow

ETL development, implementation, documentation and testing experience

Experience with programming languages (e.g., Python, Groovy, Java, Perl, …)

Flexibility in working from Prague (Czech Republic) with business trips abroad if required by the customer

Advanced English

EU passport or work permit for Czech Republic is required


Knowledge of scripting and programming

Familiar with CASE modeling

Experience with ETL tools and best practices

Knowledge of Teradata products and tools and utilities

Experience with End to End solution development

Any other European language


World-class technical training within Teradata University

Every new hire gets a detailed training plan containing on-site training about Teradata Vantage architecture

25 days of holiday a year, 3 sick days and various other time off to enjoy special occasions

Flexibility of working from home and from our fully equipped office in the 24 th floor of the second tallest building in Prague

Private medical care

Meal vouchers

Company’s contribution for the Pension fund

Life insurance

Company’s assistance in case of sickness (25% of your gross base salary) in addition to local regulations

Employee referral program (4,000$ USD)

Relocation bonus (if coming to Prague from abroad)

Sports and activities membership program

Language courses for employees

Employee stock purchase program

Contribution of 300$ USD for a mobile phone of your choice (every 2 years)

Description:
EPAM is a leading global provider of digital platform engineering and development services. We are committed to having a positive impact on our customers, our employees, and our communities. No matter where you are located, you will join a dedicated, creative, and diverse community that will help you discover your fullest potential.
DESCRIPTION

We are looking for Big Data Engineers with at last 1 year of commercial experience to join our growing Data Practice and make our team even stronger. Projects and technologies we are working with are very different and cover all technologies which present currently on the market and represented by open source communities.

We are providing our service to Clients in different domains: Financial, Health Care, Insurance and many others, so you will have a chance to develop yourself in any direction you want.

You can work in our office in Prague or remotely. The remote option applies only to the Candidates who will be working from any location in Czech Republic.

Description:
Risk Platform - Support Engineer
Prague
As a Barclays Risk Platform – Support Engineer, you will be accountable for managing the service quality provided to the Risk stake holders and takes E2E responsibility of service operations. The E2E support includes ensuring Application management, KPI monitoring and reporting, service availability and the platform stability. You will manage the service improvement plan and Risk identification and mitigation. You will be accountable for the presentation of KPIs and metrics and managing infra-activities and auditing for applications.


Barclays is one of the world's largest and most respected financial institutions, with 329 years of success, quality and innovation behind us. Job_title: QA Engineer - build automated testing from the ground up
Description:
Protecting one billion people from cyber threats? If you feel like this proposition is rather exciting than scary, come on board and grow with us. Become a significant part of an important and ambitious project as a QA Engineer. Cybersecurity plays a crucial role in our society. And as our CTO Robert Šefr says, “Cybersecurity is a human right not a privilege.”
WHAT YOUR JOB WILL LOOK LIKE
You will kick start the automation team – so you will be the founding stone to quality code in WLB.
Create E2E tests, define test cases with our developers and create a fully automated environment. Work on integration tests for management API, and E2E tests on performance-intensive components and keep functions, performance, and logic of our product as high as possible.

Your future company
For our client, an international insurance and investment company, we are looking for a Data Engineer with English. We are hiring this vacancy as full-time long term standard contract only. The company is based in Prague.
Requirements
previous experience as Data engineer
3+years relevant experience with the Azure stack (Azure Data Lake, Azure Data
Factory), Azure Databricks, programming in Python.
5+ years relevant experience data warehouse design and data lake concepts and
practices
Factory, Databricks)

Description:
Microsoft Development Center in Prague has got multiple positions open for Software Engineers to be hired across different teams.

The hiring groups are:

Identity Platform/Microsoft Entra - sits within our Security, Compliance, Identity and Management Division and is at the heart of the day-to-day technology experience for billions of humans globally, playing a critical part in enabling everyone to achieve more. Our suite of products powers everything from Windows to Office, Azure to Xbox. Microsoft Entra is a dynamic and inclusive team which cares deeply about our customer experience and works to solve extraordinarily complex problems at extreme scale.

Microsoft Identity and Network Access – IDNA Security Engineering team. Authentication Method Runtime team, of which you would be a part, is charged with delivering modern, secure, and delightful authentication experiences for customers, enabling the right methods for the right occasion. Authentication service, where you will work, serves > 100B requests per day touching over 1B humans globally.

Description:
About Us:
SentinelOne is defining the future of cybersecurity through our XDR platform that automatically prevents, detects, and responds to threats in real-time. Singularity XDR ingests data and leverages our patented AI models to deliver autonomous protection. With SentinelOne, organizations gain full transparency into everything happening across the network at machine speed – to defeat every attack, at every stage of the threat lifecycle.
We are a values-driven team where names are known, results are rewarded, and friendships are formed. Trust, accountability, relentlessness, ingenuity, and OneSentinel define the pillars of our collaborative and unified global culture. We're looking for people that will drive team success and collaboration across SentinelOne. If you're enthusiastic about innovative approaches to problem-solving, we would love to speak with you about joining our team!

Description:
Junior Software Developer - fresh graduate-230000XO

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Junior Software Engineer - Platform
Full time job for fresh graduate student finishing this year or being MAX 12months after UNI graduation with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

Description:
Základní kvalifikace:
Být absolventem/absolventkou střední nebo vyšší odborné školy s IT specializací nebo specializací v příbuzném oboru nebo odborné pracovní zkušenosti v oboru.
Znalost počítačů (hardwaru i softwaru) a ochota učit se novým technologiím a dovednostem.
Prokázaná předchozí zkušenost se zlepšováním stávajících procesů a postupů při poskytování prvotřídních služeb.
Předchozí zkušenost se spoluprací s různorodými týmy.
Zákaznicky orientovaný přístup s prokazatelnou historií.
Znalost českého jazyka.
Popis práce
V Amazonu aspirujeme být společností nejvíce zaměřenou na zákazníky na světě, kde zákazníci mohou najít, objevit a nakoupit on-line vše, co chtějí. Najímáme ty nejchytřejší a nabízíme jim prostředí, ve kterém mohou neúnavně zlepšovat možnosti pro naše zákazníky a tím jejich zkušenosti s našimi službami.
Inovace a kreativita jsou jádrem společnosti a jsou podporovány na všech úrovních našich zaměstnanců. Každý den řešíme složité technické a obchodní problémy pomocí vynalézavosti a zjednodušování. Vytváříme historii a dobrou zprávou je, že jsme teprve na začátku.
Jako IT Technik / IT Engineer budete reportovat IT Manažerovi ve vašem domovském distribučním centru a budete zodpovědní za přímou podporu lidí pracujících v provozním týmu. Takto budete bezprostředně podporovat ty, kteří přímo umožňují doručení zakoupených položek zákazníkům. Budete spolupracovat s různými odděleními, kterým vy a vaši kolegové poskytnete prvotřídní IT podporu. Budete klíčovou součástí různorodého týmu, ve kterém budete přinášet vysoce kvalitní výsledky a vždy hledat zlepšení.
Nejedná se o tradiční kancelářskou roli, budete sídlit v srdci našeho distribučního centra a pracovat na směny, a to buď 8 hodin v pěti dnech v týdnu nebo 10 hodin ve čtyřech dnech v týdnu.
Chcete-li se dozvědět více o provozu Amazonu a vidět, jak fungují naše distribuční centra, podívejte se na krátké video nebo se zúčastněte živé virtuální prohlídky. Video s titulky: https://www.amazon.com/videotour
Co dělá tento tým skvělým místem pro práci?
Benefity
Key job responsibilities


Budete poskytovat podporu 1. a 2. úrovně (přes tiketový systém), která zajišťuje, že veškeré IT vybavení a infrastruktura běží na optimální výkon a že jsou plněny všechny klíčové ukazatele (KPI) a úroveň služeb (SLA) ve vašem distribučním centru a také v jakémkoliv vzdáleném centru, které Vy a Váš tým podporujete.



Preferovaná kvalifikace
Vezměte prosím na vědomí, že nemusíte splňovat všechny výše uvedené požadavky; jakákoli kombinace je vítána!

Amazon se zavazuje k zajištění rovných pracovních příležitostí pro všechny uchazeče. Pevně věříme, že nábor zaměstnanců s různými dovednostmi je základem našeho úspěchu. Při náboru se rozhodujeme na základě vašich zkušeností a dovedností. Ceníme si vaší vášně objevovat, vymýšlet, zjednodušovat a budovat.
Ochrana vašeho soukromí a bezpečnost vašich dat je pro Amazon dlouhodobě nejvyšší prioritou. Přečtěte si prosím naše Oznámení o ochraně osobních údajů, kde se dozvíte více o tom, jak shromažďujeme, používáme a přenášíme osobní údaje našich kandidátů.

Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

Description:
Associate Software Engineer
Brno, Czech Republic

The Opportunity:
Anthology offers the largest EdTech ecosystem on a global scale, supporting over 150 million users in 80 countries. Our mission is to provide dynamic, data-informed experiences to the global education community so that learners and educators can achieve their goals.

Description:
Microsoft Development Center in Prague has got multiple positions open for Software Engineers to be hired across different teams.

Microsoft Entra is a dynamic and inclusive team which cares deeply about our customer experience and works to solve extraordinarily complex problems at extreme scale.

Description:
Role : Data Engineer

Job Location : Prague – Hybrid

Teradata helps businesses unlock value by turning data into their greatest asset. We’re the cloud data analytics platform company, built for a hybrid multi-cloud reality, solving the world's most complex data challenges at scale. Collectively, we endeavour to serve equal parts innovator and contributor. Because our mission isn’t just about the collection of data – it’s about revolutionizing the future of transportation to save lives, optimizing energy costs to make the planet a cleaner place, and using data to predict and identify cancer risks.

Teradata’s Global Delivery Center (GDC) brings together data enthusiasts from all corners of the world to support our customers within the EMEA region. We analyze their business needs and address them with the most sophisticated data solutions including Data Warehouses, Data Lakes, Operational Data Stores and much more.

Role Description

We are looking for a Data Engineer to perform various tasks during the Data Warehouse implementation like analyses, database and architecture design, gathering business requirements, creating testing and implementation scenarios, developing and implementing planned solutions etc.


Performing data warehouse tasks for large projects (database design, business analyses, collecting business requirements and translating into technical solution, ETL development)

Deliver business and application specific consulting services included in the integrated Teradata solutions

Support the pre-sale process as well as client communication

Participating in a mapping and design of customer’s business needs to the Teradata database and BI components

Understand Business Data Model and logical mappings (source mappings, LDM mappings)

Understand detailed, technical Source Target mappings

Develop and implement ETL and BI solutions

Perform unit testing and package jobs to be prepared for deployment

Present and explain the implanted solution to the customer


Any experience working on DWH projects

Familiar with collecting business requirements and transforming them to the technical solution

Familiar with the creation/modification of a Data Model and Mappings or Technical ETL specifications (Source to Target Mapping)

Excellent SQL knowhow

ETL development, implementation, documentation and testing experience

Experience with programming languages (e.g., Python, Groovy, Java, Perl, …)

Flexibility in working from Prague (Czech Republic) with business trips abroad if required by the customer

Advanced English

EU passport or work permit for Czech Republic is required


Knowledge of scripting and programming

Familiar with CASE modeling

Experience with ETL tools and best practices

Knowledge of Teradata products and tools and utilities

Experience with End to End solution development

Any other European language


World-class technical training within Teradata University

Every new hire gets a detailed training plan containing on-site training about Teradata Vantage architecture

25 days of holiday a year, 3 sick days and various other time off to enjoy special occasions

Flexibility of working from home and from our fully equipped office in the 24 th floor of the second tallest building in Prague

Private medical care

Meal vouchers

Company’s contribution for the Pension fund

Life insurance

Company’s assistance in case of sickness (25% of your gross base salary) in addition to local regulations

Employee referral program (4,000$ USD)

Relocation bonus (if coming to Prague from abroad)

Sports and activities membership program

Language courses for employees

Employee stock purchase program

Contribution of 300$ USD for a mobile phone of your choice (every 2 years)

Description:
Join a platform development team that supports all Structured Finance (one of the most dynamic areas of the Fixed Income) for Moody's.
We are looking for Software Engineers that want a long-term career solving some of the most exciting problems in finance and technology. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who loves learning, believes in continuous self-improvement, and wants to apply software development concepts to real business problems.
Don't know much about Structured Finance? Don't worry, we will teach you the basics in the first 3 months through interactions with our business experts/other team members, attending training sessions, and learning by working on small tasks at the beginning. We expect you to demonstrate curiosity about finance, ask deep questions, and display a continuous drive to learn more about our business.

Our Team: We operate like a lean start-up environment inside a larger corporation with the aim to rethink, redesign and redefine the existing product offerings in the market. Our immediate focus is on refactoring more of our legacy technology architecture into micro-services on a new cutting-edge technology stack.


You will be responsible for design, development, and support of various components for a large-scale, distributed, real-time, matrix pricing application for structured securities. This will require you to understand both technical and business roadmaps, assist with the planning of the necessary tasks to achieve the objectives, executing and delivering as per the agreed-upon timeline, continuously asses/refactor existing processes to improve on different characteristics such as speed of execution, quality, maintainability, observability, etc.

Description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Mastercard Summer Internship Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
Apply for an internship and spend your summer enhancing your skills, sharing your ideas and making a difference in the real world. The Mastercard Internship Program gives penultimate students a 10-12 week journey where they will challenge the status quo, engage in meaningful and practical sessions, drive Decency and Belonging, our mission to be a Force for Good and be the ultimate catalyst for personal and professional growth. We invite you to bring your passion, share your talent and make the most of this truly Priceless experience.

Be part of the Data & Services Technology Team at Mastercard, Data and Services

Job_title: QA Engineer - build automated testing from the ground up
Description:
Protecting one billion people from cyber threats? If you feel like this proposition is rather exciting than scary, come on board and grow with us. Become a significant part of an important and ambitious project as a QA Engineer. Cybersecurity plays a crucial role in our society. And as our CTO Robert Šefr says, “Cybersecurity is a human right not a privilege.”
WHAT YOUR JOB WILL LOOK LIKE
You will kick start the automation team – so you will be the founding stone to quality code in WLB.
Create E2E tests, define test cases with our developers and create a fully automated environment. Work on integration tests for management API, and E2E tests on performance-intensive components and keep functions, performance, and logic of our product as high as possible.

Job_title: Software Engineer II - SATCOM - C, C++ - Prague
Description:
Design solutions to drive safe living and quality of life
The future is what we make it.
When you join Honeywell, you become a member of our global team of thinkers, innovators, dreamers, and doers who make the things that make the future. That means changing the way we fly, fuelling jets in an eco-friendly way, keeping buildings smart and safe and even making it possible to breathe on Mars.

Working at Honeywell isn’t just about developing cool things. That’s why all our employees enjoy access to dynamic career opportunities across different fields and industries.



We have an opportunity for a to join our Aerospace team in Brno and Prague. Our team is developing software for satellite communication devices, where you will have an exciting opportunity to specialize in a relevant industry field and participate in developing the biggest trends in SATCOM.

In this position, you will have the chance to work on notable industry projects, example being project : secure SATCOM data link for communication between aircraft and ground control. Iris is an essential enabler of , large European project dealing with airspace automation over Europe. Involvement on such projects would provide valuable experience and a chance to apply your skills in various engineering segments.

Description:
At Hitachi Energy our purpose is advancing a sustainable energy future for all. We bring power to our homes, schools, hospitals and factories. Join us and work with fantastic people, while learning and developing yourself on projects that have a real impact to our communities and society. Bring your passion, bring your energy, and be part of a global team that appreciates a simple truth: Diversity + Collaboration = Great Innovation
Do malého oddělení inženýringu pro plynem izolované rozvodny velmi vysokého napětí (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledáme posilu role Nabídkový specialista, který administrativně podporuje české a švýcarské kolegy z oddělení inženýringu. Proč k nám? Jsme firma, kde se stále aktivně využívá selský rozum, společně si pomáháme a zaměřujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost práce. Díky tomu je tu nízká fluktuace a příjemná atmosféra. Stanete se součástí výrobního procesu, který je unikátní v celé ČR a zároveň probíhá pouze v několika podnicích na světě! V dnešní době můžeme nabídnou i určitou jistotu zaměstnání - objednávky máme na více než 3 roky dopředu.
