General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! V dnesni dobe muzeme nabidnou i urcitou jistotu zamestnani - objednavky mame na vice nez 3 roky dopredu.
Responsibilities: CO VAS V TETO ROLI CEKA? Navrh technickeho reseni na zaklade pozadavku zakaznika Priprava vykresove dokumentace pro nabidky a vyberova rizeni Projektovani ve 2D i 3D Zpracovani nakladovych kalkulaci k nabizenym projektum Kazdodenni uzka spoluprace se Svycarskym obchodnim oddelenim v anglickem jazyce Navhry zlepsovani procesu v ramci oddeleni.
Your background: PREDPOKLADY PRO VYKON TETO PRACE: VS elektrotechnickeho nebo strojniho zamereni Lepsi uzivatelska znalost prace na PC: MS Office, AutoCAD (Creo vyhodou) Znalost anglickeho jazyka na B2 prevazne pro pisemnou i ustni komunikaci se Svycarskem Selsky rozum a schopnost videt jednotlive ukoly i v sirsim kontextu Snaha ziskavat relevantni informace, spolupracovat s kolegy a dotahovat svoje ukoly do uspesneho konce a vcas. Vyhodou znalost programovani CO VAM NABIZIME: Praci na zajimavych a jedinecnych projektech do celeho sveta. Firemni kulturu postavenou na lidskych hodno-tach, vzajemnem respektu, poctivosti, kooperaci a hledani smysluplnych a efektivnich reseni. Jistotu uspesne globalni firmy v oblasti energie, ktera ma budoucnost (na dalsi 3 roky mame zajistene zakazky) Dobrou dopravni dostupnost, parkovani zdarma. Pracovi smlouvu na dobu 1 roku (v pripade spokojenosti obou stran je zvykem smlouvu prodlouzit na dobu neurcitou) 5 tydnu dovolene 7,5 hodin pruzne pracovni doby Dotovane stravovani v zavodni jidelne/stravenky Cafeteria system (moznost vyuzit nasbirane body v oblasti vzdelani, sportu nebo jinych volnocasovych aktivit) ve vysi 6 000 Kc rocne. Prispevek na penzijni pripojisteni 2-3 % ze mzdy. Mobilni SIM karty se zvyhodnenym pausalem. Odmeny za odpracovane roky a take pri odchodu do duchodu a dalsi benefity. Tesim se na Vase zivotopisy

Junior Software Engineer - Platform
Full time job for fresh graduate student finishing this year or being MAX 12months after UNI graduation with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Job_title: Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
Description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
The Mastercard Launch program is aimed at early career talent, to help you develop skills and gain cross-functional work experience. Over a period of 18 months, Launch participants will be assigned to a business unit, learn and develop skills, and gain valuable on the job experience.

Be part of the Data & Services Technology Team at Mastercard, Data and Services

Data Engineers are fundamental to the success of our client engagements by acting as the bridge between raw client data and Mastercard's software. Data Engineers work closely with both Consultants while working on consulting engagements and Software Development Engineers while working to develop internal capabilities. Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.
Specific Role Responsibilities
Working with Internal and Client SME resource to provide complex data mapping solutions in line with Client requirements, FNZ Solution and FNZ Migration SDLC
Producing technical migration outputs, such as data models, data mapping definitions and data validation rules in line with the target FNZ Product and Client Migration requirements

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer Junior would be to help the team with covering service tickets and incidents. This will give you a good understanding of the typical issues and how our applications work. Later on you will be participating on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support.

Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Be curious
Willingness to learn new things
Basic knowledge of Big Data technologies (Cloudera, Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
Basic knowledge of any JVM programming language (Java, Scala)
Nice to have

Experience with Hadoop (Cloudera distribution) and Kafka
Knowledge of RDBMS
Experience with SQL
Knowledge of GitLab and CI/CD pipelines
Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding

Join our EmbedIT family and enjoy

Easily negotiable flexi office
Motivating yearly bonuses
5 weeks of paid vacation
5 days Personal time off
Meal allowances
Contribution to pension scheme
Possible foreign business trips
Complimentary tea, subsidised coffee, free fruit on Mondays and Wednesdays
Relax room & games room
Technical trainings and certificates of your choice
Attendance at local & foreign conferences
Soft-skills and managerial trainings
Possible internal growth

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with!

Our BI team has responsibilities for the operation of big data platforms and other supportive platforms used in BI domain. For example, we install Hadoop clusters, extend HW, implement new supportive BI tools and subsequently our team maintain, support, update, patch, security, and monitor these platform and tools.

We work with various tools and technologies. Our administrators make their life easier with Ansible. We support physical and virtual servers usually running on OS Linux.

Our business partners are from the headquarters of Home Credit International placed in Prague and Home Credits in countries (India, Indonesia, Philippines, and Vietnam). The team is distributed between two locations - Prague and Brno.

Your future role

Your primary responsibility as a Big Data DevOps Engineer will be to provide BigData platform maintenance, automation, development, operations, monitoring and product support from an infrastructure and operational perspective. Prioritizes working with code and using it as a tool during product development, instead of performing tasks manually.

Not a stranger to continuous integration, pipelines, virtualization technologies, containers etc.

Has a passion for product built. Participate in design and automation improvements to continuously improve production and non-production environment. Opportunities participate on projects.

Your experience and skills
Good knowledge of Linux
Basic knowledge of Python & Bash scripting
Knowledge of working with versioning tool (Github)
Basic knowledge of SQL & Databases
Problem-solving attitude
Collaborative team spirit
Willingness to learn new things
Nice to have

Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding.
Knowledge of configuration management tools (Ansible, …)
Understanding of CI/CD tools and processes (Gitlab pipelines)
Experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role

Azul == Java. As the only company focused 100% on Java, Azul is building the Java platform for the modern cloud enterprise. Description:
Company Description

The Veeam Quality Assurance team invites you to work on Veeam products with Veeam QA professionals in the Prague R&D office.
QA has the power to breathe life into our products. Testers are always at the center of the action: developing an idea, thinking through the functionality and conducting a thousand complex experiments is all easy, and this is not the limit. The goal of QA is a quality product and millions of happy users confident that “Veeam just works.”
Veeam builds products to meet complex backup and data management challenges. We work with VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V and Nutanix AHV virtualization; Windows, Linux and Unix physical systems; Active Directory, Exchange, SharePoint, SQL, Oracle and SAP HANA servers; Amazon, Azure and Google Cloud public clouds; and many other technologies that form the core of modern IT.

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! V dnesni dobe muzeme nabidnou i urcitou jistotu zamestnani - objednavky mame na vice nez 3 roky dopredu.
Responsibilities: CO VAS V TETO ROLI CEKA? Navrh technickeho reseni na zaklade pozadavku zakaznika Priprava vykresove dokumentace pro nabidky a vyberova rizeni Projektovani ve 2D i 3D Zpracovani nakladovych kalkulaci k nabizenym projektum Kazdodenni uzka spoluprace se Svycarskym obchodnim oddelenim v anglickem jazyce Navhry zlepsovani procesu v ramci oddeleni.
Your background: PREDPOKLADY PRO VYKON TETO PRACE: VS elektrotechnickeho nebo strojniho zamereni Lepsi uzivatelska znalost prace na PC: MS Office, AutoCAD (Creo vyhodou) Znalost anglickeho jazyka na B2 prevazne pro pisemnou i ustni komunikaci se Svycarskem Selsky rozum a schopnost videt jednotlive ukoly i v sirsim kontextu Snaha ziskavat relevantni informace, spolupracovat s kolegy a dotahovat svoje ukoly do uspesneho konce a vcas. Firemni kulturu postavenou na lidskych hodno-tach, vzajemnem respektu, poctivosti, kooperaci a hledani smysluplnych a efektivnich reseni. Jistotu uspesne globalni firmy v oblasti energie, ktera ma budoucnost (na dalsi 3 roky mame zajistene zakazky) Dobrou dopravni dostupnost, parkovani zdarma. Pracovi smlouvu na dobu 1 roku (v pripade spokojenosti obou stran je zvykem smlouvu prodlouzit na dobu neurcitou) 5 tydnu dovolene 7,5 hodin pruzne pracovni doby Dotovane stravovani v zavodni jidelne/stravenky Cafeteria system (moznost vyuzit nasbirane body v oblasti vzdelani, sportu nebo jinych volnocasovych aktivit) ve vysi 6 000 Kc rocne. Description:
Relocation Assistance Offered Within Region
# 152230 - Hustopece, Jihomoravský kraj, Czech Republic
Job Summary:
The Technical Systems Manager is responsible for a) the coordination of the equipment & buildings project implementation b) the oversight of the Maintenance and Electrical/Control departments c) supervision of the Packaging Engineering d) initiating & driving CI-activities at all areas of his responsibility.
He/She stays abreast of plant performance trends versus major KPI goals and leverages all resources from the respective departments, as well as by CI (Continuous Improvement)-activities that improve plant performance and/or to derive need for , & content of, future capital program. He/She develops and manages the overall plant capital budget and the plant maintenance budget. He/She must ensure successful execution of the plant capital program which can include multiple projects with varying scope, timelines and capital expenditures. In parallel he/she has to ensure effective execution of the Planned Maintenance program. The Technical Systems Manager will also ensure that all engineering aspects of projects as well as associated documentation are in compliance with local, Colgate/Hill’s, legal and EOHS regulations.

Description:
Junior Software Developer - fresh graduate-230000XO

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Junior Software Engineer - Platform
Full time job for fresh graduate student finishing this year or being MAX 12months after UNI graduation with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer Junior would be to help the team with covering service tickets and incidents. This will give you a good understanding of the typical issues and how our applications work. Later on you will be participating on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support.

Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Be curious
Willingness to learn new things
Basic knowledge of Big Data technologies (Cloudera, Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
Basic knowledge of any JVM programming language (Java, Scala)
Nice to have

Experience with Hadoop (Cloudera distribution) and Kafka
Knowledge of RDBMS
Experience with SQL
Knowledge of GitLab and CI/CD pipelines
Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with!

Our BI team has responsibilities for the operation of big data platforms and other supportive platforms used in BI domain. For example, we install Hadoop clusters, extend HW, implement new supportive BI tools and subsequently our team maintain, support, update, patch, security, and monitor these platform and tools.

We work with various tools and technologies. Our administrators make their life easier with Ansible. We support physical and virtual servers usually running on OS Linux.

Our business partners are from the headquarters of Home Credit International placed in Prague and Home Credits in countries (India, Indonesia, Philippines, and Vietnam). The team is distributed between two locations - Prague and Brno.

Your future role

Your primary responsibility as a Big Data DevOps Engineer will be to provide BigData platform maintenance, automation, development, operations, monitoring and product support from an infrastructure and operational perspective. Prioritizes working with code and using it as a tool during product development, instead of performing tasks manually.

Not a stranger to continuous integration, pipelines, virtualization technologies, containers etc.

Has a passion for product built. Participate in design and automation improvements to continuously improve production and non-production environment. Opportunities participate on projects.

Your experience and skills
Good knowledge of Linux
Basic knowledge of Python & Bash scripting
Knowledge of working with versioning tool (Github)
Basic knowledge of SQL & Databases
Problem-solving attitude
Collaborative team spirit
Willingness to learn new things
Nice to have

Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding.
Knowledge of configuration management tools (Ansible, …)
Understanding of CI/CD tools and processes (Gitlab pipelines)
Experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role

Job_title: IT Trainee Program - Junior Cloud Engineer
Description:
Position characteristics:
We are looking for recent graduates in our IT Trainee Program who will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Technology teams.
Over the course of the two-year program you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have open positions for several roles and your landing role should be Junior Cloud Engineer. However, if you decide to change specialization during the two-year program, the landing role may end up in another team with a different focus.

Job_title: Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
Description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Job_title: IT Trainee Program - Junior Oracle Applications Engineer
Description:
Position characteristics
We are looking for recent graduates in our IT Trainee Program who will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Software Engineering teams.
Over the course of the two-year program you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have open positions for several roles and your landing role should be Junior Oracle Applications Engineer. However, if you decide to change specialization during the two-year program, the landing role may end up in another team with a different focus.

Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.
Specific Role Responsibilities
Working with Internal and Client SME resource to provide complex data mapping solutions in line with Client requirements, FNZ Solution and FNZ Migration SDLC
Producing technical migration outputs, such as data models, data mapping definitions and data validation rules in line with the target FNZ Product and Client Migration requirements

General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! V dnesni dobe muzeme nabidnou i urcitou jistotu zamestnani - objednavky mame na vice nez 3 roky dopredu.
Responsibilities: CO VAS V TETO ROLI CEKA? Navrh technickeho reseni na zaklade pozadavku zakaznika Priprava vykresove dokumentace pro nabidky a vyberova rizeni Projektovani ve 2D i 3D Zpracovani nakladovych kalkulaci k nabizenym projektum Kazdodenni uzka spoluprace se Svycarskym obchodnim oddelenim v anglickem jazyce Navhry zlepsovani procesu v ramci oddeleni.
Your background: PREDPOKLADY PRO VYKON TETO PRACE: VS elektrotechnickeho nebo strojniho zamereni Lepsi uzivatelska znalost prace na PC: MS Office, AutoCAD (Creo vyhodou) Znalost anglickeho jazyka na B2 prevazne pro pisemnou i ustni komunikaci se Svycarskem Selsky rozum a schopnost videt jednotlive ukoly i v sirsim kontextu Snaha ziskavat relevantni informace, spolupracovat s kolegy a dotahovat svoje ukoly do uspesneho konce a vcas. Vyhodou znalost programovani CO VAM NABIZIME: Praci na zajimavych a jedinecnych projektech do celeho sveta. Firemni kulturu postavenou na lidskych hodno-tach, vzajemnem respektu, poctivosti, kooperaci a hledani smysluplnych a efektivnich reseni. Jistotu uspesne globalni firmy v oblasti energie, ktera ma budoucnost (na dalsi 3 roky mame zajistene zakazky) Dobrou dopravni dostupnost, parkovani zdarma. Pracovi smlouvu na dobu 1 roku (v pripade spokojenosti obou stran je zvykem smlouvu prodlouzit na dobu neurcitou) 5 tydnu dovolene 7,5 hodin pruzne pracovni doby Dotovane stravovani v zavodni jidelne/stravenky Cafeteria system (moznost vyuzit nasbirane body v oblasti vzdelani, sportu nebo jinych volnocasovych aktivit) ve vysi 6 000 Kc rocne. Prispevek na penzijni pripojisteni 2-3 % ze mzdy. Mobilni SIM karty se zvyhodnenym pausalem. Odmeny za odpracovane roky a take pri odchodu do duchodu a dalsi benefity. Tesim se na Vase zivotopisy

You will report to the Data Engineering lead, and support the team by working from our office in Prague (CZ) or our office in Houten (NL). #LI-LS12345









Tak jako je technologie v srdci digitální transformace našich klientů, tak i my rozumíme, že lidi jsou srdcem úspěchu podnikaní.

Jakmile se přidáte k CGI, stanete se důvěryhodným poradcem, spolupracujícím s kolegy a klienty za účelem podávaní použitelných rad, které vedou ke smysluplným a udržitelným výsledkům. Naše zaměstnance nazýváme "členy", protože jsou akcionáři, a tedy i vlastníci, kteří si užívají společnou práci, růst a budování společnosti, na kterou jsme všichni hrdí. Toto byl náš Sen už od roku 1976, a posunul nás tam, kde jsme nyní - jeden z největších nezávislých poskytovatelů IT a obchodních konzultačních služeb.

V CGI rozpoznáváme bohatost, kterou přináší diverzita. Snažíme se vytvářet pracovní kulturu, do které všichni patříme a spolupracujeme s klienty na vytváření inkluzívních komunit. Jako zaměstnavatel poskytující stejné příležitosti, chceme podpořit všechny členy v úspěchu a růstu. Pokud potřebujete ubytování kdykoliv v průběhu náborového procesu, dejte nám prosím vědět, rádi vám pomůžeme.

Jste připraveni stát se součástí našeho úspěšného příběhu? Přidejte se k CGI - kde Vaše nápady a činy mají vliv.

Description:
Junior Software Developer - fresh graduate-230000XO

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Junior Software Engineer - Platform
Full time job for fresh graduate student finishing this year or being MAX 12months after UNI graduation with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

Company Description

The Veeam Quality Assurance team invites you to work on Veeam products with Veeam QA professionals in the Prague R&D office.
QA has the power to breathe life into our products. Testers are always at the center of the action: developing an idea, thinking through the functionality and conducting a thousand complex experiments is all easy, and this is not the limit. The goal of QA is a quality product and millions of happy users confident that “Veeam just works.”

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Job_title: Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
Description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
The Mastercard Launch program is aimed at early career talent, to help you develop skills and gain cross-functional work experience. Over a period of 18 months, Launch participants will be assigned to a business unit, learn and develop skills, and gain valuable on the job experience.

Be part of the Data & Services Technology Team at Mastercard, Data and Services

Data Engineers are fundamental to the success of our client engagements by acting as the bridge between raw client data and Mastercard's software. Data Engineers work closely with both Consultants while working on consulting engagements and Software Development Engineers while working to develop internal capabilities. Description:
Meet the guys you might work with!

Our BI team has responsibilities for the operation of big data platforms and other supportive platforms used in BI domain. For example, we install Hadoop clusters, extend HW, implement new supportive BI tools and subsequently our team maintain, support, update, patch, security, and monitor these platform and tools.

We work with various tools and technologies. Our administrators make their life easier with Ansible. We support physical and virtual servers usually running on OS Linux.

Our business partners are from the headquarters of Home Credit International placed in Prague and Home Credits in countries (India, Indonesia, Philippines, and Vietnam). The team is distributed between two locations - Prague and Brno.

Your future role

Your primary responsibility as a Big Data DevOps Engineer will be to provide BigData platform maintenance, automation, development, operations, monitoring and product support from an infrastructure and operational perspective. Prioritizes working with code and using it as a tool during product development, instead of performing tasks manually.

Not a stranger to continuous integration, pipelines, virtualization technologies, containers etc.

Has a passion for product built. Participate in design and automation improvements to continuously improve production and non-production environment. Opportunities participate on projects.

Your experience and skills
Good knowledge of Linux
Basic knowledge of Python & Bash scripting
Knowledge of working with versioning tool (Github)
Basic knowledge of SQL & Databases
Problem-solving attitude
Collaborative team spirit
Willingness to learn new things
Nice to have

Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding.
Knowledge of configuration management tools (Ansible, …)
Understanding of CI/CD tools and processes (Gitlab pipelines)
Experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role

Join our EmbedIT family and enjoy

Easily negotiable flexi office
Motivating yearly bonuses
5 weeks of paid vacation
5 days Personal time off
Meal allowances
Contribution to pension scheme
Possible foreign business trips
Complimentary tea, subsidised coffee, free fruit on Mondays and Wednesdays
Relax room & games room
Technical trainings and certificates of your choice
Attendance at local & foreign conferences
Soft-skills and managerial trainings
Possible internal growth

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer Junior would be to help the team with covering service tickets and incidents. This will give you a good understanding of the typical issues and how our applications work. Later on you will be participating on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support.

Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Be curious
Willingness to learn new things
Basic knowledge of Big Data technologies (Cloudera, Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
Basic knowledge of any JVM programming language (Java, Scala)
Nice to have

Experience with Hadoop (Cloudera distribution) and Kafka
Knowledge of RDBMS
Experience with SQL
Knowledge of GitLab and CI/CD pipelines
Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding

Job_title: IT Trainee Program - Junior Cloud Engineer
Description:
Position characteristics:
We are looking for recent graduates in our IT Trainee Program who will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Technology teams.
Over the course of the two-year program you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have open positions for several roles and your landing role should be Junior Cloud Engineer. However, if you decide to change specialization during the two-year program, the landing role may end up in another team with a different focus.

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. In the process, we’re positively impacting the lives of millions of customers and merchants globally. Even with thousands of employees spread across multiple continents, we still maintain a culture that inspires innovation, rewards risk-taking and celebrates success. If you want to take more ownership of your career, then you're ready to be part of Groupon.
At Groupon, we know that great people make great companies. We're a "best of both worlds" kind of company. We're big enough to have the resources and scale, but small enough that a single person has a surprising amount of autonomy and can make a meaningful impact. We're curious, fun, a little intense, and kind of obsessed with helping local businesses thrive. Does that sound like a compelling place to work?

Description:
This position is located within the Migrations Team at FNZ. The Migration Team has accountability for managing the end-to-end delivery lifecycle for all Migration projects within FNZ.

The role involves working with big data, designing, developing, maintaining and supporting the Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) process. Reporting to the Migration Team Lead, you will work as an integral part of the team, analysing requirements before designing & implementing solutions.

Working with Internal and Client SME resource to provide complex data mapping solutions in line with Client requirements, FNZ Solution and FNZ Migration SDLC
Producing technical migration outputs, such as data models, data mapping definitions and data validation rules in line with the target FNZ Product and Client Migration requirements

Description:
We’re looking for an energetic, skilled data engineer to join our team and work with us on our marketing solutions platform. You will play an important role in the development of the new ScanmarQED cloud-based data platform, develop scalable applications and work side-by-side with the team to create new solutions, test your own ideas and share your knowledge.
You will report to the Data Engineering lead, and support the team by working from our office in Prague (CZ) or our office in Houten (NL). We are looking for an individual who would describe themselves as someone who loves working with the latest technologies, is capable of abstract thinking and has good problem solving and communication skills. If you can create tools that enable the business to achieve the next growth stage and you get energized by doing this, we would like you to be part of our team!

General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! Description:
Who are we?

The Data Domain is responsible for establishing, consolidating, and unifying data and analytics services across the business area of Compressor Technique within Atlas Copco. We strive to become the business partner for trusted, transparent, and robust enterprise data to enable data driven decision making.

What are we looking for?

We are looking for experienced Data Engineers to build and maintain enterprise, production-grade data pipelines, considering business requirements and data platform standards.

Examples of technologies you will be working with: Azure Data Lake Storage, Delta Lake, Azure Data Factory, Databricks, Azure SQL, Azure Dev Ops.

As a Data Engineer you work in close collaboration with the data & analytics platform architect and platform owner, product owners, data modelers, colleague data engineers and data teams in the business.

Tasks

Responsibilities

Requirements

Skills & Experience



Best of breed (Cloud) storage solutions, both for unstructured and structured data

Streaming and batch ingestion from source systems both in the cloud and on-premises, private and public

Code-first approach using Spark (Databricks)

Deploy, configure, and operationalize analytics engines and its clustered infrastructure

Expose data based on consumption use-cases like data science, self-service analytics, business intelligence and operational APIs for process integration

Health, logging, monitoring, debugging, automation

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.

Job_title: IT Trainee Program - Junior Cloud Engineer
Description:
Position characteristics:
We are looking for recent graduates in our IT Trainee Program who will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Technology teams.
Over the course of the two-year program you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have open positions for several roles and your landing role should be Junior Cloud Engineer. However, if you decide to change specialization during the two-year program, the landing role may end up in another team with a different focus.

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer Junior would be to help the team with covering service tickets and incidents. This will give you a good understanding of the typical issues and how our applications work. Later on you will be participating on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support.

Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Be curious
Willingness to learn new things
Basic knowledge of Big Data technologies (Cloudera, Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
Basic knowledge of any JVM programming language (Java, Scala)
Nice to have

Experience with Hadoop (Cloudera distribution) and Kafka
Knowledge of RDBMS
Experience with SQL
Knowledge of GitLab and CI/CD pipelines
Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with!

Our BI team has responsibilities for the operation of big data platforms and other supportive platforms used in BI domain. For example, we install Hadoop clusters, extend HW, implement new supportive BI tools and subsequently our team maintain, support, update, patch, security, and monitor these platform and tools.

We work with various tools and technologies. Our administrators make their life easier with Ansible. We support physical and virtual servers usually running on OS Linux.

Our business partners are from the headquarters of Home Credit International placed in Prague and Home Credits in countries (India, Indonesia, Philippines, and Vietnam). The team is distributed between two locations - Prague and Brno.

Your future role

Your primary responsibility as a Big Data DevOps Engineer will be to provide BigData platform maintenance, automation, development, operations, monitoring and product support from an infrastructure and operational perspective. Prioritizes working with code and using it as a tool during product development, instead of performing tasks manually.

Not a stranger to continuous integration, pipelines, virtualization technologies, containers etc.

Has a passion for product built. Participate in design and automation improvements to continuously improve production and non-production environment. Opportunities participate on projects.

Your experience and skills
Good knowledge of Linux
Basic knowledge of Python & Bash scripting
Knowledge of working with versioning tool (Github)
Basic knowledge of SQL & Databases
Problem-solving attitude
Collaborative team spirit
Willingness to learn new things
Nice to have

Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding.
Knowledge of configuration management tools (Ansible, …)
Understanding of CI/CD tools and processes (Gitlab pipelines)
Experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar software engineering role

Job_title: IT Trainee Program - Junior Oracle Applications Engineer
Description:
Position characteristics
We are looking for recent graduates in our IT Trainee Program who will participate in a range of activities that will develop your knowledge and skills to become an effective part of our Software Engineering teams.
Over the course of the two-year program you will cover three boot camps that introduce you to the basics then advance into further topics depending on the chosen specialism. Coupled with hands-on placements in various teams and time with expert mentors you will get a broad introduction to Digital and IT.
There are two main programs; one covers Digital and Cloud the other Enterprise IT and the core systems. We have open positions for several roles and your landing role should be Junior Oracle Applications Engineer. However, if you decide to change specialization during the two-year program, the landing role may end up in another team with a different focus.

Description:
Groupon’s mission is to become the daily habit in local commerce and fulfill our purpose of building strong communities through thriving small businesses by connecting people to a vibrant, global marketplace for local services, experiences, and goods. Description:
Company Description

The Veeam Quality Assurance team invites you to work on Veeam products with Veeam QA professionals in the Prague R&D office.
QA has the power to breathe life into our products. Testers are always at the center of the action: developing an idea, thinking through the functionality and conducting a thousand complex experiments is all easy, and this is not the limit. The goal of QA is a quality product and millions of happy users confident that “Veeam just works.”
Veeam builds products to meet complex backup and data management challenges. We work with VMware vSphere, Microsoft Hyper-V and Nutanix AHV virtualization; Windows, Linux and Unix physical systems; Active Directory, Exchange, SharePoint, SQL, Oracle and SAP HANA servers; Amazon, Azure and Google Cloud public clouds; and many other technologies that form the core of modern IT.

Description:
Junior Software Developer - fresh graduate-230000XO

Applicants are required to read, write, and speak the following languages: English
Preferred Qualifications

Junior Software Engineer - Platform
Full time job for fresh graduate student finishing this year or being MAX 12months after UNI graduation with starting day June 1st, 2023 and further.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join the Platform team at Oracle-NetSuite in Brno. The platform at NetSuite allows developers, partners and customers to build powerful solutions on top of the core NetSuite system. It supports a wide-variety of features, such as allowing to build a custom data model, to add business logic through custom scripts, to create complex workflows, access model, integrations and many others. You would be working on building and enhancing this highly complex and critical system, with particular focus on clean design of architecture, data structures and APIs. The extraordinary expressive power of platform needs high speed of execution, so coming up with fast algorithms and efficient designs is critical for its (and our) success.

General information: Do maleho oddeleni inzenyringu pro plynem izolovane rozvodny velmi vysokeho napeti (divize High Voltage Products Brno) hledame posilu role Nabidkovy specialista, ktery administrativne podporuje ceske a svycarske kolegy z oddeleni inzenyringu. Proc k nam? Jsme firma, kde se stale aktivne vyuziva selsky rozum, spolecne si pomahame a zamerujeme se na efektivitu/smysluplnost prace. Diky tomu je tu nizka fluktuace a prijemna atmosfera. Stanete se soucasti vyrobniho procesu, ktery je unikatni v cele CR a zaroven probiha pouze v nekolika podnicich na svete! V dnesni dobe muzeme nabidnou i urcitou jistotu zamestnani - objednavky mame na vice nez 3 roky dopredu.
Responsibilities: CO VAS V TETO ROLI CEKA? Navrh technickeho reseni na zaklade pozadavku zakaznika Priprava vykresove dokumentace pro nabidky a vyberova rizeni Projektovani ve 2D i 3D Zpracovani nakladovych kalkulaci k nabizenym projektum Kazdodenni uzka spoluprace se Svycarskym obchodnim oddelenim v anglickem jazyce Navhry zlepsovani procesu v ramci oddeleni.
Your background: PREDPOKLADY PRO VYKON TETO PRACE: VS elektrotechnickeho nebo strojniho zamereni Lepsi uzivatelska znalost prace na PC: MS Office, AutoCAD (Creo vyhodou) Znalost anglickeho jazyka na B2 prevazne pro pisemnou i ustni komunikaci se Svycarskem Selsky rozum a schopnost videt jednotlive ukoly i v sirsim kontextu Snaha ziskavat relevantni informace, spolupracovat s kolegy a dotahovat svoje ukoly do uspesneho konce a vcas. Vyhodou znalost programovani CO VAM NABIZIME: Praci na zajimavych a jedinecnych projektech do celeho sveta. Firemni kulturu postavenou na lidskych hodno-tach, vzajemnem respektu, poctivosti, kooperaci a hledani smysluplnych a efektivnich reseni. Jistotu uspesne globalni firmy v oblasti energie, ktera ma budoucnost (na dalsi 3 roky mame zajistene zakazky) Dobrou dopravni dostupnost, parkovani zdarma. Pracovi smlouvu na dobu 1 roku (v pripade spokojenosti obou stran je zvykem smlouvu prodlouzit na dobu neurcitou) 5 tydnu dovolene 7,5 hodin pruzne pracovni doby Dotovane stravovani v zavodni jidelne/stravenky Cafeteria system (moznost vyuzit nasbirane body v oblasti vzdelani, sportu nebo jinych volnocasovych aktivit) ve vysi 6 000 Kc rocne. Prispevek na penzijni pripojisteni 2-3 % ze mzdy. Mobilni SIM karty se zvyhodnenym pausalem. Odmeny za odpracovane roky a take pri odchodu do duchodu a dalsi benefity. Tesim se na Vase zivotopisy

Description:
We are looking for a Support Engineer to join our energetic and motivated Global 1000+ company. The Support Engineer will be responsible for implementing and maintaining hardware and software products, identifying problems and fixing reported issues, troubleshooting problems and implementing solutions. A successful candidate will enjoy a growth-oriented team environment, strong benefits and regular opportunities for professional development.
Essential Skills (behavioural/technical/ language skills)
1. English & Czech
Resident Engineer Job Description
*Provide onsite and desk side support services to end users. *Complete incidents and requests within SLA in a pressurized environment. *Build, configure and troubleshoot Install “Gold” image on Customer PC and laptop applications and hardware components. *Ensure tickets are updated on a daily basis. *Support meeting room environment and video conferencing. *Support printers, scanners, and other peripherals. *Support mobile devices, such as iPads, iPhones, and Android devices. *End-User Data back-up and restoration when required in the course of a service incident. *Smart hands support for data center equipment as per required SLA (in specified locations) *As directed by Customer Tech support will assist in troubleshooting the data center devices *Replace defective components cards in data center equipment’s as advised by Customer Tech Support e.g., Remove a module and replace it, reconnecting patch cables. Daily tape change in support of local Backup Routine in required sites *Import /Export tapes to the tape libraries as advised by Customer tech support. *Individual must have good customer-facing skills and be well-presented. *Demonstrates independent and pro-active thinking *Builds effective relationships both within the team and across the business and Professional Services *Must be able to work to specified standards and required levels of deportment, conduct, and sound ethical workplace practices. *Must be able to work alone and unsupervised, taking the initiative when necessary. *Must be organized and prioritize work appropriately. *Ability to resolve or assist in the resolution of complex customer problems and maximize systems availability in standardized customer environments. *Basic management skills in planning, problem solving, solution innovation, analysis. *Good oral, written, and telephone communication skills. *Ability to build and maintain relationships with customers, peers, and support partners. *Good teamwork with peers in a local, global, virtual, or multifunctional *Must have experience in using a Call Logging system. *Must have a good working knowledge of Windows 7/10 and related Office applications. *Support experience of MACs would be beneficial *Knowledge of mobile devices, Androids, and iPhones *Working knowledge of current and legacy hardware platforms. Experience with building, configuring, replacing, and troubleshooting PC and laptop hardware components. *Familiarity with Microsoft SCCM. *Ability to replace defective parts, as identified by Customer. *Excellent hands-on experience in installation and troubleshooting DC equipment’s, Rack and Stack of the DC equipment/cable *Excellent communication is mandatory in English and Local language *Completion of CompTIA certifications – e.g. A+, Network+, etc. *Completion (or near completion) of Microsoft certifications – e.g., MCP, MCITP, MCSE

Cloud Services Engineer
EUMETSAT is Europe’s meteorological satellite agency - monitoring the weather and climate from space - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.
EUMETSAT opened a portfolio of cloud-based big data services in 2020 to bring users to its data. The portfolio is based on advanced architectures, applications, user portals and hosted processing capabilities with full integration across the entire cloud stack from Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) up to Data as a Service (DaaS). EUMETSAT has a key role in several cloud-based international initiatives such as DIAS, WekEO, European Weather Cloud (EWC) and Destination Earth.
Within the Competence Area of Cloud Services in the Digital Solutions and SAF Division (DSA), the Cloud Services Engineer will be the main technical focal point for all cloud services and solutions developed by DSA that have a focus on downstream applications. The postholder will manage the engineering, evolution and maintenance of those cloud services, including procurement and management of industrial support and services needed for their development, implementation, evolution and achieving the targeted service levels

Description:
Mondi Štětí a.s.
Nejlepší zaměstnavatel v České republice? Mondi Štětí!

Job_title: Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
Description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a
culture of inclusion
for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Mastercard Graduate Launch Program 2023 - Data Engineer - Prague, Czech Republic
The Mastercard Launch program is aimed at early career talent, to help you develop skills and gain cross-functional work experience. Over a period of 18 months, Launch participants will be assigned to a business unit, learn and develop skills, and gain valuable on the job experience.

Be part of the Data & Services Technology Team at Mastercard, Data and Services

Data Engineers are fundamental to the success of our client engagements by acting as the bridge between raw client data and Mastercard's software. Data Engineers work closely with both Consultants while working on consulting engagements and Software Development Engineers while working to develop internal capabilities. Data Engineers are responsible for:

Make an Impact as a Data Engineer
Here are just a few of the benefits that you will get to experience during your first year as a Data Engineer:
Bring your passion and expertise

Description:
Meet the guys you might work with

Big data team consists of 5 Big Data Engineers and together with our DevOps team we have end-to-end responsibility for Big Data platform. We run mostly on Cloudera’s Hadoop distribution. On top of that runs another 30 services. As we provide our services to 4 countries where Home Credit International a.s. operates, we need to be flexible and ready for change. Despite the uniqueness of the countries we develop applications as a product and configure it according to local needs. The scope of technologies we work with is evolving and we bring in new technologies whenever the team needs it.

Your future role

Your main task as Big Data Engineer Junior would be to help the team with covering service tickets and incidents. This will give you a good understanding of the typical issues and how our applications work. Later on you will be participating on a whole lifecycle of big data product: i.e. analysis, solution design, development, deployment, documentation creation incl. model and further support.

Main language we are using is Scala with Spark. Also, you’ll come across of Hive, Impala, Kafka, Jupyter, Kerberos, Gitlab and many others.

Your experience and skills
Be curious
Willingness to learn new things
Basic knowledge of Big Data technologies (Cloudera, Hadoop, Spark, Hive)
Basic knowledge of any JVM programming language (Java, Scala)
Nice to have

Experience with Hadoop (Cloudera distribution) and Kafka
Knowledge of RDBMS
Experience with SQL
Knowledge of GitLab and CI/CD pipelines
Agile/Scrum development cycle understanding

Join our EmbedIT family and enjoy

Easily negotiable flexi office
Motivating yearly bonuses
5 weeks of paid vacation
5 days Personal time off
Meal allowances
Contribution to pension scheme
Possible foreign business trips
Complimentary tea, subsidised coffee, free fruit on Mondays and Wednesdays
Relax room & games room
Technical trainings and certificates of your choice
Attendance at local & foreign conferences
Soft-skills and managerial trainings
Possible internal growth
